title: How big is Travis Scott compared to Kanye West? Which one of them is more famous? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which one is more famous? Kanye. Hands down. However, of late we do see a lot of rappers / rap videos / instrumentals being influenced by Travis Scott's music so this answer might change in a few years from now on. How big is Travis Scott compared to Kanye West? Kanye is 5'8"[1] and Travis Scott is 5'9.5"[2] Kidding. Big is a very relative statement. One can be big in lyricisms, rap video (overall content), musical genius, wordplays and punchline heavy bars. Anything. Overall, I would still like to believe Travis Scott's influence is around 80% that of Kanye. The origins of melodic rap were… Guess? Welcome to Heartbreak (from what I feel) was the original melodic rap by Kanye and Kid Cudi.  Footnotes[1] Kanye West Height - How tall[2] Travis Scott Height
Kanye West maybe better known than Jaques Webster, but as much as being famous? That's a natter of opinion and I'd would not be able to guess on this as I'm not a follower of either of them. Sorry!
Travis Scott is definitely more famous. Kanye used to be famous, before his life was ruined with Kim K. This ruined him. Travis Scott is becoming more popular with each song that he makes.
I think travis Scott is taller than Kanye so he is bigger as for which one is more famous I don’t have any idea or interest
